entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS0021 error (Cannot apply indexing with [] to an expression of type) appears incorrectly on code that compiles #69663
  • The `/embed` option allows for untracked inputs to the compilation #69661
    17.9
  • The /embed option does not allow for portable builds with line directive targets #69659
  • Web Application with specific config not analysed by MsBuildWorkspace #69654

Closed

  • ExtractInterfaceCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled. #68971
  • Captured primary constructor parameters should be hidden from intellisense. #69300
    17.8 P3
  • Semantic snippets: type snippets should have different valid modifiers #69599
  • An assert is fired in NullableWalker for scenario in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UnitTests.CodeGen.CodeGenTupleTests.HugeTupleCreationParses unit-test #39976
  • "Go To Implementation" doesn't find all implementations #66008
    17.8 P4
  • Find all references on generated file yields no results #69270
    17.8 P2
  • Don't offer non-abstract and non-virtual statics after type parameter #64733
    18.0
  • The code coloring is wrong #69660
  • InvalidOperationException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.BindOutVariableDeclarationArgument #66806
    17.8
  • Tracking issue for analyzers/fixers to convert existing code to collection expressions. #69132
    17.8 P3
  • "Make member readonly" is offered even in cases where it silently changes behavior #69645
    Backlog
  • Generic name angle brackets #27236
    Backlog
  • Disable warning wave like CS8981 via #pragma #69657
  • Collapse to definitions ( CTRL + M + O ) should collapse local functions #68513
    Backlog
  • "error CS9027: Unexpected keyword 'unchecked'" is reported for cref syntax #69142
    17.9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34021.281 #69652
  • C# editor: A method can not be collapsed #68778
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Stabilize LongInitializers test #69666
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Offer 'use implicit object' in a few more apparent locations #69651
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix CSharpSyntaxContext when dealing with UTF8 string literals #69650
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Find symbols defined in a source-generated compilation in the originating compilation #69642
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix TFM for function pointer expected output tests #69506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update versions in NuGet-packages.md #69665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Filter out captured primary constructor parameters from completion lists. #69647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump NuGet version used by tests #69662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use different valid modifiers for different type declaration snippets #69653
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Stop descending through tuple when no slot can be created #69513
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Fix completion for static-abstracts on type parameters #69664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Add locals to binder from out vars in array rank specifiers on local functions #69597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code fluent collection building to a collection expression #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where errant comments were preventing code collapsing #69644
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow collapsing local function definitions if desired by user #69646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Report misplaced unchecked in cref as warning #69609
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add ctor to Stack Trace Explorer #69630
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update Versions.props for 17.8 P2 #69260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Make the [Experimental] warning as error by default #69639
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update rule ID for 'Unnecessary call to Set.Contains' #69282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, 17.8
  • Update doc for IsRecord #69607
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 preview 7 ref assemblies in compiler tests #69614
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • [17.7] Cache substituted base type #69635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
